Package pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    IText  
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Capitalize
    Сlass capitalizing the first letter in each word
    ExpandAbbreviation
    This class expands abbreviations to their full form
    InputString
    Class to give input string on which transformations will be performed
    NumbersToText
    This class transforms numbers into letters
    PolitePhrases
    Тhis class makes addressing to the addressee more polite
    ReplacementOfCharacters
    Class changing Polish characters to Latin characters
    Reverse
    This class outputs characters in reverse order
    TextTransformer
    This is just an example to show that the logic should be outside the REST service.
    ToAbbreviation
    This class translates certain words into their abbreviations
    ToLower
    Class converting all the characters to lowercase
    ToSentence
    Сlass capitalizing the first letter in a sentence
    ToUpper
    Class converting given text to UPPERCASE
